http://sportsillustrated.cnn.com/2005/magazine/04/12/survey.expanded/
 
 Among the results:
It is a sin to engage in homosexual behavior - 41% agree, 48% disagree
 
 Homosexuality is a way of life that should be accepted by society - 61% agree, 33% disagree
 
 Society should not put any restrictions on sex between consenting adults in the privacy of their own home - 77% agree, 18% disagree
 
 Gay and lesbian couples can be as good parents as heterosexual couples - 
 59% agree, 38% disagree
 On the other hand... 
Gay marriage would go against my religious beliefs - 55% agree, 38% disagree
